critical_rules.no_mock_data_policy: ABSOLUTELY NO hardcoded mock data - use real data or (MOCK) labeled test data
critical_rules.server_requirements: MUST run dev server on port 3002

relationships.workouts_to_drills: Use drill_ids column, NOT junction tables

src/components/teams/dashboard/UpcomingS.purpose: Remove weather since it's not in practices table
